competitors.name: Duck Creek Technologies
competitors.notes: Founded in 2000, focuses on P&C and general insurance industry with cloud-based platform for insurance systems

competitors.name: Majesco
competitors.notes: Founded in 1982, provides technology and insurance experience for P&C and L&AH insurers with platform solutions for core insurance functions

context: Guidewire was founded in 2001 (formerly known as Centrica Software) by John Raguin, Mark Shaw, Kenneth W Branson, John Seybold and James Kwak. Limited specific competitor information available from 2001 as the company was just starting. Duck Creek Technologies (founded 2000) and Majesco (founded 1982) were the established players in the insurance software market at that time.
